title: AssertionError: Image Not Found ../dataset/images/train/4501.jpeg
body:
Input:
```
python3 train.py --img 640 --batch 16 --epochs 5 --data ./data/dataset.yaml --cfg ./models/yolov5s.yaml --weights weights/yolov5s.pt
```
